name: rehabstudio
body:
We are digital craftspeople.

Story tellers, creatives, technologists, strategists and lots of other things in between.

Our sweet spot lies where our love for problem solving meets our talent for creating digital experiences that people love to play with, remix and share.

Founded in Belfast in 2005, we work with brands and agencies around the globe to create beautiful interactive experiences.

We are Hand Built Digitalâ„¢
